changes.change: Hopefully fixed startup crash. Fixed GestureSupport Landscape (therefore fixing some iPad layout issues)
Changes to snapshot generation to hopefully improve missioncontrol performance. Fixed 9.0 crash when using empoleon/swipeover/missioncontrol.

Better snapshotting for MC/Empoleon/SwipeOver. Better CC disabler (should improve empoleon swipe gesture reliability). Improved gesture support. New hosting method (should reduce number of black out windows). Major internal reformatting. Improved localization method (including prefs).
Added macOS styled theme. Optimized Image assets (should reduce size significantly). Fixed GestureSupport. Fixed ReachApp crash. Bunch of internal optimizations for release candidate.
